00043   typedef double flt_t;

00049   enum {MAX_B_SIZE = 4};
00050 
00056   struct observation
00057   {
00058     virtual ~observation(){}
00059     observation() { set_default_values(); }
00060     void set_default_values(void) { 
00061       c_max = squared_c = std::numeric_limits<flt_t>::max(); 
00062       c_min = -std::numeric_limits<flt_t>::max();
00063       confidence = 1.; 
00064       weight = 1.; 
00065       sqrt_weight = 1.; 
00066       ground_truth_outlier = false; 
00067       delete_me=false;
00068       array_delete_me=false;
00069     }
00070     void set_weight(flt_t w) { weight =w; sqrt_weight = w*w; }
00071     flt_t squared_c_current, squared_c, c_min, c_max;
00072     flt_t weight, sqrt_weight;
00073     flt_t confidence;
00074     flt_t *b;
00075     bool outlier, ground_truth_outlier, delete_me, array_delete_me;
00076     virtual flt_t residual(const flt_t *computed_b) const;
00077     virtual int get_nb_measures() const=0;
00078     virtual void eval_func(const flt_t *state, flt_t *b, flt_t *J, void **user_data) const =0;
00079     bool operator < (const observation &a) const { return confidence > a.confidence; }
00080   };
00081 
00083   typedef void (*func_nn_ptr)(const flt_t *state, const flt_t *data, int data_size, 
00084     flt_t *b, flt_t *J, void **user_data);
00085 
00087   template <int nb_data, int nb_obs> 
00088   struct observation_nn : observation {
00089     flt_t data[nb_data];
00090     flt_t y[nb_obs];
00091 
00092     func_nn_ptr f;
00093 
00094     observation_nn(func_nn_ptr eval, const flt_t *d, const flt_t *b) { 
00095       f = eval; 
00096       memcpy(data, d, nb_data*sizeof(flt_t));
00097       memcpy(y, b, nb_obs*sizeof(flt_t));
00098       this->b = &y[0];
00099     }
00100     virtual ~observation_nn(){}
00101     virtual int get_nb_measures() const {return nb_obs;}
00102     virtual void eval_func(const flt_t *state, flt_t *b, flt_t *J, void **user_data) const {
00103       f(state, data, nb_data, b, J, user_data);
00104     }
00105     virtual flt_t residual(const flt_t *computed_b) const {
00106       flt_t r=0;
00107       for (int i=0; i<nb_obs; i++) {
00108         flt_t d = computed_b[i] - y[i];
00109         r += d*d;
00110       }
00111       return r;
00112     }
00113   };
